title: Didn't receive my mistery skin
body: As of today, the 30th or September, i didn't receive my mystery gift(because i already own riot kayle for quite some time now). I received the icon about 2-3 days ago.

replies.body: The day isn't over just yet, and we're in the process of wrapping things up.  Stay tuned on our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) as we conclude distributing gifts.  The goodies will come, and even if there are any issues we will be happy to help!  Fear not!
The support banner cannot be accessed (at least from euw), thus we thought the delivery was over. Sorry if it caused some trouble, but that was our only way of cheking if we had been left out

It's inaccessible from NA, and I also haven't received the mystery gift. Could we have this messaging in-client, maybe, until you're caught up? Having to go to a (currently broken) website's a bit poor, really.
(Also, if people have to contact support to get it, that's expensive for you and expensive for the players.)
i also own riot kayle since the start of thet year and i only get the icon 2 weeks ago

I received the 10 year anniversary icon, yet I still remain to receive Riot Kayle. I have noted that the support banner indicating that the delivery was still in process has been deleted, thus, I'll probably send a support ticket to see what was the problem. I'll also mention that the rest of the times I was entitled to a gift by Riot, I had to ask for it in a support ticket after the delivery time expired. They kindly provided me with it without issues, but makes me wonder if there are some problems to reach certain people accounts in the gifting procedure.
I didn't receive it neither and the Riot post saying " skins are still being sent out " got deleted I'll call the support tomorrow but hope We could get help from an Admin
